data.condition: ($BC = true) and ($BC1R = 'BS' or $BC1R = 'CONS' or $BC1R = 'EC' or $BC1R = 'GBS' or $BC1R = 'GDS' or $BC1R = 'KP' or $BC1R = 'PA' or $BC1R = 'SA' or $BC1R = 'LFC' or $BC1R = 'NLFC' or $BC1R = 'OGN' or $BC1R = 'OGP' or $BC1R = 'OTH')
data.contentText: If more than one isolate was found, please document name, sensitivities and resistances of additional organisms in free text below.
data.title: Blood Culture Cont
